undelegate_explanation: 任何从CPU的带宽未定义的EOS将在3天内不可用,等待期过后,将显示为可用.
will_have_less_than_one_eos_staked: You will have less than 1 EOS staked to Bandwidth and/or CPU. That may prevent you from carrying out transactions when the network is busy.
about_to_unstake: You are about to stake/unstake some coins, please note that all coins that were unstaked will have to be claimed in 72 hours.
unstaking_will_be_reset: which will not be available for a renewed 72 hours if you proceed.
